entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
